short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that promotes a healthier digital experience by mitigating addictive behaviors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Project Dopamine is your key to a distraction-free YouTube experience. Say goodbye to addictive thumbnails, YouTube Shorts, and psychological triggers. This Chrome extension transforms your YouTube interface, making it a sanctuary for focused video watching. Thumbnails turn black and white, shorts disappear, and distractions vanish, giving you a mindful environment to engage with content. Install Project Dopamine to regain control of your digital well-being and enjoy a more intentional YouTube journey. Your focus, your rules.
